title: Single Arm Front Raises to Overhead Extension
description: Stand with your back straight, your feet shoulder width apart, and your arms hanging naturally by your sides Keeping your arms fully extended and your torso stationary, lift one hand out in front of you up until it reaches your shoulder level, exhale as you do so Lightly squeeze your shoulder muscles at this position, and then continue to elevate your arm until it is outstretched overhead Hold briefly and then gently lower your arm back to the starting position in a smooth controlled movement inhaling as you do so
